notes: 101=rain; 110=hail; 111=drizzle; 203=freezing rain; 212=freezing drizzle; 308=ice pellets; 405=snow; 409=snow pellets; 413=ice crystals; 414=snow grains

description: day/night sky state (combined cloud cover and opacity)
notes: 0-1=sunny/clear; 2-3=mainly sunny/cloudy periods; 4-5-6=mix of sun and clouds/partly cloudy; 7-8=mainly cloudy/mainly cloudy; 9=cloudy/cloudy; 10=cloudy/overcast
